# nexus-modal

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                      | Type                                             | Default |
| ------------ | ------------ | -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------- |
| `fullscreen` | `fullscreen` | Whether the modal is fullscreen. | `boolean`                                        | `false` |
| `show`       | `show`       | Whether to show the modal.       | `boolean`                                        | `false` |
| `size`       | `size`       | Adjust modal width.              | `"full" \| "lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'md'`  |


## Events

| Event        | Description                        | Type               |
| ------------ | ---------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `closeEvent` | Event fired when the modal closes. | `CustomEvent<any>` |


----------------------------------------------
